member.name: T:Penguin.Web.JsonClient
member.summary: WebClient with options to upload/download objects by converting to/from Json, for Json endpoints. Use "UploadJson" and "DownloadJson"

member.name: P:Penguin.Web.JsonClient.DefaultSettings
member.summary: The default settings to use for serialization/deserialization if not otherwise specified

member.name: M:Penguin.Web.JsonClient.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the serializing web client
member.param: The default settings to use for serialization/deserialization if not otherwise specified
